definition: handle or shaft (of an axe etc)/(of a flower, leaf or fruit) stem/sth that affords an advantage to an opponent/classifier for knives or blades
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
third of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/third in order/letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 165°/propyl
handle/(fig.) information that can be used against sb
a matter for ridicule/an object of ridicule/laughingstock
a pretext for gossip/a matter for derision
to hand someone the swordhilt (idiom)/to give someone a hold on oneself
at the helm of state/political power/regime
hand drill with a crank handle

sentences.english: Feed is manually provided by cranking the handle of the compound rest.

sentences.chinese: 柄應使用高強度超合金製作。

sentences.english: The red knife of light appeared stabbing the darkness through and through.

sentences.english: His left hand, which rested on his enamelled sword hilt, was bandaged.
sentences.chinese: 他那按在寶劍琺琅柄上的左手外面裹着繃帶。

sentences.english: I always wanted to do the killing part. 'Is that a dagger that I see before me?
sentences.chinese: 我一直想扮演刺客，我面前看到的是柄短劍嗎？

sentences.english: Let not the sword-knife mock its hperdle for being dull.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓刀鋒嘲諷它柄子的拙鈍。

sentences.english: Anger is as a stone cast into a wasp' s nest.
sentences.chinese: 憤怒就像是把石頭柄進了馬蜂窩。

sentences.english: They're curious about your pearl-handle revolvers.
sentences.chinese: 他們對你的珍珠柄左輪手槍很好奇。

sentences.english: This grip also comes with stainless steel bar that removes onion smell.
sentences.chinese: 這款握柄同樣用不鏽鋼棒材製成，可去除洋蔥的氣味。

sentences.english: Willowy, has the handle peduncle to connect to the abdominal cavity, the boundary is unclear.

sentences.english: Aphrodisium faldermannii rufiventris Gressitt is an important pest of broadleaf trees.
sentences.chinese: 紅腹柄天牛是闊葉樹的重要害蟲之一。
